item.description:
Fingers crossed that the warmer weather is on it's way and the snow is moving out....

I would hate to jinx it, but let's go ahead and plan for a shorter ride starting at the Foxboro State Park. This is one we've done before -- it heads out towards 140/Rte 1. There are hills (rolling) and so it'll warm up those legs after having the winter off.

Let's plan to meet in the small parking lot across for the main entrance. When it doubt, look for the bikes!

~10 mile loop starting at the Foxboro State Park and heading towards 140/Rte 1. There are hills (only one "major" one on 140 that I remember) so it'll be a workout but with a noticeably shorter distance.

Hope you can make it!
item.name: Hoping for warm weather -- short, local ride
